name: What is the capital of France?
text: Paris is the capital city of France. It's one of the most famous cities in the world.

name: What is 2 + 2?
text: Simple math question, what is the result of adding 2 and 2?

name: What is the boiling point of water?
text: Boiling point of water can be considered in different conditions. What is the standard boiling point?

name: What is the largest planet in our solar system?
text: Jupiter is the largest planet in our solar system. It is a gas giant and has a strong magnetic field.

name: What is the chemical formula for water?
text: The chemical formula of water is H2O, consisting of two hydrogen atoms bonded to one oxygen atom.

name: What is the Pythagorean theorem?
text: The Pythagorean theorem states that in a right-angled triangle, the square of the length of the hypotenuse is equal to the sum of the squares of the lengths of the other two sides.

name: Who discovered the theory of relativity?
text: Albert Einstein is credited with the discovery of the theory of relativity, one of the two pillars of modern physics.

name: What is the process of photosynthesis?
text: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants use sunlight to synthesize foods from carbon dioxide and water, releasing oxygen as a byproduct.
